forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun casts a gentle warmth across the city, though it’s tempered by a mild breeze from the west. The temperature, hovering near a comfortable 65 degrees, invites leisurely strolls along the waterfront or a visit to one of the many quaint cafés. The wind, with occasional playful gusts, adds a refreshing edge to the warmth, and as the afternoon settles in, you might feel the chill begin to creep in, beckoning for a light jacket.

As twilight approaches, a subtle blanket of clouds will drape the sky, bringing a cooler night that settles around 55 degrees. Perfect for quiet contemplation or a casual dinner al fresco, the evening air, while mostly cloudy, is still mellow and inviting. The marine layer, likely lingering just off the coast, will not impose its usual fog but may contribute to a slight haze, particularly as you gaze toward the Golden Gate Bridge or the hills beyond. A relaxed wardrobe is ideal today; think layers—perhaps a lightweight sweater paired with your favorite chinos or jeans. As day turns into evening, find comfort in the atmosphere; enjoy a leisurely stroll, take in the city’s vibrant energy, or simply unwind with a book at a nearby park, watching the world move around you as the glow of the city softens under the evening cloud cover.
